channel.title: Cant get on
channel.description: i just downloaded moparscape, but when i wanna start it says error connecting server must be down ... The ip is 127.0.0.1 Plz help me

item.title: Cant get on
item.dc:creator: @weeds weeds
item.description:
@weeds wrote:

ok if you’re trying to go one server on you’re own then download a server source from google when u have it click run.bat and connect from 127.0.0.1 if you’re trying to get on with other players then goto moparscape status page and looks for one if u like it clcik on it and copy the thing that says ip into the ip box then any user and password and connect it may say error just keep clciking it for about 5mins and it will probably work if it does’t then theserver is offline or being updated

www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
there the status page link credits to rash for the link lol saved me time =)

Read full topic
